title: (x) Annelise Coste "Loin loin loin" exhibition poster - Autostrada {Fabienne}
author: Brendan Callahan

comments.content: Looks like some type of ocr font. Not sure which...
I've looked through the Lineto collection but didn't find anything.

(finally one I can ID!)  
The font is Autostrada, designed by Elektrosmog (Marco Walser) in 2001.  
Yves, you looked in the right place but the font is not commercially available.  
Brendan, how did you come across that poster in the US?
Whoa! Good one, Fabi. Nice catch. :^)
